directions: Fill a large pot with water and add beef; bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer until meat can be punctured with a fork, about 30 minutes. Stir in soy sauce, white sugar, garlic, and ground black pepper; cook and stir until flavors combine, about 15 minutes.

Stir shishito peppers and eggs into the beef mixture. Cook and stir until meat can easily be pulled apart with a fork and liquids have been reduced to a third of the original amount, about 15 minutes.
ingredients: 1/2 pound beef brisket, cut into 2-inch pieces
3 shishito peppers, or more to taste (optional)
3 hard boiled eggs, sliced, or more to taste (optional)
title: Korean Beef Simmered in Soy Sauce (Jangjorim)
